Description: Here we have our Cloudformation building block that we'll base all of our expermients on!

StackName.Description: The name of the stack we'll reference in the resources

VPCIDR.Description: The IP range of the VPC in CIDR notation

PubSubNet1IP.Description: The IP range we'll use for the first public subnet

PubSubNet2IP.Description: The IP range we'll use for the second public subnet

PriSubNet1IP.Description: The IP range we'll use for the first private subnet

PriSubNet2IP.Description: The IP range we'll use for the second private subnet
